body:
Hello all!

As you may have known, the Sr. Staff team has been organizing a public beta testing for the update. It was originally planned for 7 PM EST, but there were many complaints regarding EU players being unable to attend. We've concluded that we'll have a small testing tonight, after we finish our staff meeting, and we'll hold a large one tomorrow (March 29th) at around 1-2 PM EST. The IP for the beta server, as well as the time will be posted shortly. The main reason I've informed you so late is to prevent an overload of players, upon request from Ivy. 

Looking forward:

After the end of the staff meeting, I will make another thread regarding exactly what we've discussed and concluded on during the meeting.

UPDATE:

Testing has ended for tonight. Feedback would be nice! Don't worry, there'll be a larger one tomorrow c:
body_tagged:
